metadata.title: Under Armour Girls' Quilted Puffer Jacket, Front Pockets & Hooded Back, Mid-Weight & Water Repellent
features: A COLD WEATHER STAPLE: A necessity for any girls' wardrobe, featuring a longer length, front pockets, a hooded back and UA Storm technology that repels water without sacrificing breathability, this jacket is perfect for staying warm and comfortable.
PREMIUM QUALITY: We use high-quality materials in all our clothing to ensure maximum comfort, longevity and lasting power. Always a soft and comfortable fit.
THE PERFECT GIFT: A great item for gifting!
UNDER ARMOUR: Under Armour is built on performance. Our vision is to inspire you with performance solutions you never knew you needed and can't imagine living without.
description: Fabric repels water without sacrificing breathability. Longer length, built to feel warm, dry and light. Allover quilting insulated with lightweight heat technology for optimal warmth. 3-piece hood construction for superior fit. Elastic at side hood, cuffs & hem, with hand warmer pockets and zippe closure.
